sentences.english: Davis won the 400 metre hurdles in a new Olympic time of 49.3 sec.
sentences.chinese: 戴维斯以49.3秒这一新的奥运会记录在400米跨栏赛跑中夺冠。

sentences.chinese: 他向我猛冲过来，狠狠地抓住了我。

sentences.chinese: 我得说我是从《吉尼斯世界纪录》这本书里找到了这一信仰。

sentences.chinese: 霍尔奎斯特夫妇已经结婚七年，但是直到今年他们才联系了吉尼斯世界纪录。

sentences.chinese: 对于每一个参数化问题的近似结果，这个程序也会显示误差的边界。

sentences.chinese: 旅程大约花了七个小时。

detailed_translations.english: used to show that sth is almost, but not completely, accurate or correct

sentences.english: Internet connections through conventional phone lines are fairly slow.
sentences.chinese: 通过传统的电话线来连接因特网速度很慢。

sentences.english: Bake for 20 minutes in a conventional oven; 8 in a microwave.
sentences.chinese: 在传统的烤炉中烘烤20分钟，在微波炉里则烤8分钟。

sentences.chinese: 福斯特也跟着笑了起来。

sentences.chinese: 电视成了逃避现实的一种方式。

sentences.english: I think the government has lost touch with reality (= no longer understands what is real or true ) .

detailed_translations.english: what actually happens or is true, not what is imagined or thought

sentences.chinese: 表面上看，她显得信心十足，而实际上她紧张得要命。

sentences.english: Once we make the adjustments for inflation, the fall in interest rates is quite small.
sentences.chinese: 如果我们按通货膨胀调整，利率降幅其实很小。

sentences.chinese: 比赛打得很艰难。

sentences.english: She’s had a tough life.
sentences.chinese: 她的生活十分艰辛。

sentences.chinese: 公司承认那是艰难的一年。

sentences.chinese: 尽管是一个艰难的决定，但由于天气不好我们只得取消比赛。

sentences.chinese: 很快她就在抛接5个鸡蛋了。

sentences.chinese: 我很高兴来汇报今早完成的第一次急速短跑三项全能运动！

sentences.chinese: 世界重量级拳击冠军

sentences.chinese: 奥运会冠军

sentences.chinese: 他们的车大些，所以更舒适些。

sentences.chinese: 飞机把我们降落在巴塞罗那机场。

sentences.chinese: 罗马尼亚位于欧洲东南部，东北面和乌克兰及摩尔多瓦接壤，西面和匈牙利接壤，南面隔着多瑙河的是塞尔维亚和保加利亚。

trans: （人物或事物之）简介；侧面，轮廓

sentences.chinese: 多谢你的帮助，我真的很感激。

sentences.chinese: 如果你能让我继续工作，我会非常感激。

sentences.chinese: 你告诉传达员你正在等待一个来自这个客户的电话，并允许将他们接进来。

sentences.english: Striped tails are a common feature of many animals.
sentences.chinese: 尾巴上有条纹是许多动物的共同特征。

sentences.english: The hotel’s only redeeming features (= things that make it acceptable ) were that it was cheap and near the city centre.
sentences.chinese: 这家旅馆仅有的可取之处就是价格低廉并且靠近市中心。

sentences.english: One of the distinguishing features (= features that are different from other things of the same sort ) of modern banking is its dependence on computers.
sentences.chinese: 现代银行业的显著特征之一就是依赖电脑。

sentences.english: It's a great film and it features a Spanish actor who is going to be a world star within a year.
sentences.chinese: 那是一部精彩的电影，它由一位西班牙演员主演，他一年之内就会成为国际明星。

sentences.english: The hour-long programme will be updated each week and feature highlights from recent games.
sentences.chinese: 这个一小时的节目将每周更新，重点介绍近期比赛的精彩部分。

detailed_translations.chinese: 特征，特色；面貌；特写，专题节目；故事片
detailed_translations.english: a part of something that you notice because it seems important, interesting, or typical
When something such as a film or exhibition features a particular person or thing, they are an important part of it

sentences.english: Well, at least I can face them all with a clear conscience (= the knowledge that you have done nothing wrong ) .
sentences.chinese: 好吧，至少我可以问心无愧地面对他们所有人。

sentences.english: I can’t tell you what to do – it’s a matter of conscience (= something that you must make a moral judgment about ) .
sentences.chinese: 我不能告诉你怎么办——这是良心问题。

sentences.english: a crisis of conscience among medical staff (= a situation in which it is very difficult to decide what is the right thing to do )
sentences.chinese: 医务人员中的良心危机

detailed_translations.english: the part of your mind that tells you whether what you are doing is morally right or wrong

sentences.english: Leeds United were worthy winners of the competition.
sentences.chinese: 利兹联队是比赛当之无愧的获胜者。

sentences.english: a worthy opponent
sentences.chinese: 值得钦佩的对手

sentences.english: A couple of other books are worthy of mention.
sentences.chinese: 还有一些其他的书值得一提

detailed_translations.english: deserving respect from people

sentences.english: He works for a large American corporation.
sentences.chinese: 他在一家美国大公司工作。

sentences.english: multinational corporations
sentences.chinese: 跨国公司

sentences.english: the Siemens Corporation
sentences.chinese: 西门子公司

detailed_translations.english: a big company, or a group of companies acting together as a single organization

sentences.english: We’ll have to budget more carefully.
sentences.chinese: 我们必须更仔细地安排开支。

sentences.english: This scheme enables you to budget the cost through fixed monthly payments.
sentences.chinese: 这个计划可以让你把费用分摊在每个月里等额偿还。

sentences.english: Cheap flights are available from budget travel agents from $240.
sentences.chinese: 起价$240的廉价机票可从一些经济旅行社那里买到。

detailed_translations.english: to carefully plan and control how much money you spend and what you will buy with it

detailed_translations.chinese: 低廉的， 收费公道的
detailed_translations.english: Budget is used in advertising to suggest that something is being sold cheaply
the money that is available to an organization or person, or a plan of how it will be spent

sentences.english: He borrowed £150,000 and used the money for legal expenses.
sentences.chinese: 他借了15万英镑用于支付律师费。

sentences.english: Conference rooms were equipped at great expense.
sentences.chinese: 装备会议室花费巨大。

detailed_translations.chinese: 花费， 消费， 费用； 开支， 业务费用
detailed_translations.english: the amount of money that you spend on something

sentences.english: The interview was broadcast live across Europe.
sentences.chinese: 这次采访向整个欧洲进行了现场直播。

detailed_translations.chinese: 播送，播放；（无线电或电视）广播；播撒（种子）
detailed_translations.english: to send out radio or television programmes
a programme on the radio or on television

sentences.english: I knew I could rely on David.
sentences.chinese: 我知道我可以信赖戴维。

sentences.english: They relied heavily on the advice of their professional advisers.
sentences.chinese: 他们非常依赖专业顾问的建议。

detailed_translations.english: to depend on something in order to continue to live or exist

sentences.english: Therefore, we are not to rely on feelings, but to have faith in the facts.
sentences.chinese: 因此，我们不能依靠我们的感觉，而是要将信心建立在事实上。

sentences.english: But what of the resources we rely on to sustain and develop our technology?
sentences.chinese: 但是我们依靠什么资源来支持和发展我们的科技？

sentences.english: However, many objects rely on other objects or layers of infrastructure.
sentences.chinese: 然而，许多对象依赖基础结构的其它对象或层。

sentences.english: Artists translate their ideas into visual images.
sentences.chinese: 画家把自己的思想转换成视觉画面。

detailed_translations.english: relating to seeing

sentences.english: a useful technique for generating new ideas
sentences.chinese: 能产生新创意的有用技术

sentences.english: The program would generate a lot of new jobs.
sentences.chinese: 这个项目将创造许多新的就业岗位。

detailed_translations.english: to produce or cause something

sentences.english: His immediate response was one of disbelief.
sentences.chinese: 他的第一反应是不相信。

sentences.english: Carl made no response , and carried on with his meal.
sentences.chinese: 卡尔没有回答，继续吃饭。

detailed_translations.english: something that is done as a reaction to something that has happened or been said

sentences.english: The concert will be broadcast in stereo.
sentences.chinese: 音乐会将用立体声播放。

sentences.english: stereo equipment
sentences.chinese: 立体声音响设备

detailed_translations.english: a way of recording or playing sound so that it is separated into two signals and produces more natural sound
using a recording or broadcasting system in which the sound is directed through two speakers

name: have no use for
trans: 不需要；讨厌，对……不耐烦，厌恶

sentences.english: I've no use for people who don't make an effort.
sentences.chinese: 我厌恶那些不努力的人。

detailed_translations.chinese: 不需要；讨厌，对……不耐烦，厌恶
detailed_translations.english: to not need sth

name: refresh
trans: 使（精神）振奋，使恢复；更新

sentences.english: A shower will refresh you.
sentences.chinese: 洗个淋浴你就凉快了。

sentences.english: He refreshed himself with a glass of iced tea.
sentences.chinese: 他喝了杯冰茶提了提神。

detailed_translations.english: to make someone feel less tired or less hot

sentences.english: The poor weather was partly responsible for the crash.
sentences.chinese: 天气不好是造成坠机事故的部分原因。

sentences.english: The company’s problems are partly due to bad management.
sentences.chinese: 那家公司的问题部分是由于管理不善造成的。

sentences.english: It is partly because of her sick mother that she hasn’t taken the job abroad.
sentences.chinese: 她没有接受那份去国外的工作，部分原因是母亲病了。

sentences.english: The group is funded partly by the government.
sentences.chinese: 那个团体的部分资金由政府提供。

detailed_translations.english: to some degree, but not completely

sentences.english: On the night the murder was committed , he was out of the country.
sentences.chinese: 凶案发生当晚他不在国内。

sentences.english: The man accused of her murder will appear in court today.
sentences.chinese: 被指控谋杀她的那名男子将于今天出庭。

sentences.english: He was found guilty of attempted murder.
sentences.chinese: 他被判谋杀未遂。

sentences.english: She was charged with two counts of first degree murder.
sentences.chinese: 她被控犯有两项一级谋杀罪。

sentences.english: The mother of the murder victim wept in court.
sentences.chinese: 凶案死者的母亲在法庭上痛哭。

sentences.english: Police are searching for the murder weapon.
sentences.chinese: 警方在寻找杀人凶器。

sentences.english: He was convicted of murdering a policeman.
sentences.chinese: 他被判谋杀一名警察的罪名成立。

detailed_translations.english: the crime of deliberately killing someone
to kill someone deliberately and illegally

sentences.english: It did not take Andrew long to pack a suitcase.
sentences.chinese: 安德鲁没有用多长时间就整理好了手提箱。

detailed_translations.english: a large case with a handle, used for carrying clothes and possessions when you travel

sentences.english: I’ll go and find you some clean sheets and blankets.
sentences.chinese: 我去给你们找些干净的床单和毯子。

sentences.english: white cotton sheets
sentences.chinese: 白色的棉布床单

sentences.english: a sheet of paper with names and numbers on it
sentences.chinese: 写了姓名和电话号码的一张纸

sentences.english: a sheet of glass
sentences.chinese: 一块玻璃

detailed_translations.english: a large piece of thin cloth that you put on a bed to lie on or lie under

sentences.english: She's not only a great dramatic actress but she's also very funny.
sentences.chinese: 她不仅是一位伟大的女戏剧演员，而且也很幽默。

detailed_translations.english: a woman who performs in a play or film

sentences.english: I’m a slow typist.
sentences.chinese: 我打字很慢。

detailed_translations.english: a secretary whose main job is to  type  letters

sentences.english: a White House spokesman
sentences.chinese: 白宫发言人

detailed_translations.english: a man who has been chosen to speak officially for a group, organization, or government

sentences.english: She was fluent in English, French, and German.
sentences.chinese: 她的英语、法语和德语都很流利。

detailed_translations.english: able to speak a language very well

sentences.english: The hostess introduced them.
sentences.chinese: 女主人介绍了他们。

detailed_translations.chinese: 女主人，女老板；女服务员；舞女；女房东
detailed_translations.english: a woman at a party, meal etc who has invited all the guests and provides them with food, drink etc

sentences.english: an invitation to speak at a scientific conference
sentences.chinese: 在科学大会上发言的邀请

sentences.english: We sent out more than 300 wedding invitations.
sentences.chinese: 我们发出了超过300份婚礼请柬。

detailed_translations.english: a written or spoken request to someone, inviting them to go somewhere or do something

sentences.english: officials appointed by the government
sentences.chinese: 政府任命的官员

sentences.english: The committee appointed a day in June for celebrations.
sentences.chinese: 委员会把庆典定在6月的一天举行。

detailed_translations.chinese: 任命，委派；约定，确定，指定
detailed_translations.english: to choose someone for a position or a job

sentences.english: deputy/vice chairman Barrett serves as vice chairman.
sentences.chinese: 巴雷特担任副主席一职。

detailed_translations.english: someone, especially a man, who is in charge of a meeting or directs the work of a committee or an organization

sentences.english: He did not raise the subject again.
sentences.chinese: 他再也没有提起这个话题。

sentences.english: I’d like to raise the issue of publicity.
sentences.chinese: 我想提一提宣传问题。

sentences.english: Betty raised the important question of who will be in charge.
sentences.chinese: 贝蒂提出了一个重要问题，就是将由谁来负责。

detailed_translations.english: to begin to talk or write about a subject that you want to be considered or a question that you think should be answered

sentences.english: The lighted dial of her watch said 1.20.
sentences.chinese: 她手表上的夜光表面显示时间为1点20分。

sentences.english: I think I dialed the wrong number.
sentences.chinese: 我想我拨错号码了。

detailed_translations.english: the round part of a clock, watch, machine etc that has numbers that show you the time or a measurement
to press the buttons or turn the dial on a telephone in order to make a telephone call

sentences.english: Hello, operator? Could you put me through to Room 31?
sentences.chinese: 喂，接线员吗？请帮我接31号房间。

sentences.english: computers which can be used by untrained operators
sentences.chinese: 未经训练的操作者也可使用的电脑

detailed_translations.english: someone who works on a telephone switchboard, who you can call for help

sentences.english: the Ford’s 2.8 litre engine
sentences.chinese: 福特汽车2.8升排量的引擎

detailed_translations.chinese: [计量] 公升（米制容量单位）
detailed_translations.english: the basic unit for measuring liquid in the metric system

sentences.english: Laura is very mature for her age.
sentences.chinese: 相对她的年龄来说劳拉是很成熟的。

sentences.english: We’re mature enough to disagree on this issue but still respect each other.
sentences.chinese: 我们都很成熟，尽管我们对此事意见不同，但还是彼此尊重。

sentences.english: As the fish matures, its colours and patternings change.
sentences.chinese: 随着发育成熟，这种鱼的颜色和斑纹都会改变。

detailed_translations.english: someone, especially a child or young person, who is mature behaves in a sensible and reasonable way, as you would expect an adult to behave
to become fully grown or developed

sentences.english: Their music will never go out of fashion (= stop being fashionable ) .
sentences.chinese: 他们的音乐永不过时。

sentences.english: Please leave the building in an orderly fashion.
sentences.chinese: 请大家有秩序地离开大楼。

sentences.english: Perhaps they could sit down and discuss things in a civilised fashion.
sentences.chinese: 也许他们可以坐下来心平气和地商量事情。

sentences.english: She will be working out her problems in her own fashion (= in the way that she usually does this ) .
sentences.chinese: 她会以自己的方式来解决她的问题。

detailed_translations.english: something that is popular or thought to be good at a particular time

sentences.english: The article was misleading, and the newspaper has apologized.
sentences.chinese: 那篇文章具有误导性，那家报纸已致歉。

detailed_translations.chinese: 令人误解的， 导致错误结论的； 引入歧途的； 欺骗的； 迷惑人的
detailed_translations.english: likely to make someone believe something that is not true

sentences.english: People on welfare are wrongly seen as lazy or dishonest.
sentences.chinese: 靠福利救济的人被误以为懒惰或不老实。

detailed_translations.english: not honest, and so deceiving or cheating people

sentences.english: alcoholic drinks
sentences.chinese: 酒精饮料

detailed_translations.english: relating to alcohol or containing alcohol
someone who regularly drinks too much alcohol and has difficulty stopping

sentences.english: ...Cuba's tobacco crop.
sentences.chinese: …古巴的烟草作物。

detailed_translations.chinese: 烟草，烟叶；烟草制品；抽烟
detailed_translations.english: the dried brown leaves that are smoked in cigarettes, pipes etc

sentences.english: Smoking is banned in the building.
sentences.chinese: 大楼内禁止吸烟。

detailed_translations.english: to say that something must not be done, seen, used etc
an official order that prevents something from being used or done

sentences.english: You don't have to sacrifice environmental protection to promote economic growth.
sentences.chinese: 你们没有必要牺牲环保来促进经济增长。

detailed_translations.english: If people promote something, they help or encourage it to happen, increase, or spread

sentences.english: Deliberately making people suffer is immoral.
sentences.chinese: 故意使人吃苦头是不道德的。

sentences.english: It’s immoral to be rich while people are starving and homeless.
sentences.chinese: 不管别人忍饥挨饿、居无定所而自己发家致富是不道德的。

detailed_translations.chinese: 不道德的；邪恶的；淫荡的
detailed_translations.english: morally wrong

sentences.english: a decent burial
sentences.chinese: 得体的葬礼

sentences.english: Paul visited the local bars more frequently than was decent for a senior lecturer.
sentences.chinese: 保罗过于频繁地光顾当地酒吧，不太合乎高级讲师的身份。

sentences.english: The chairman did the decent thing (= did what people thought he ought to ) and resigned.
sentences.chinese: 主席体面地辞去了职务。

detailed_translations.english: following moral standards that are acceptable to society

sentences.english: Refugee workers said such action was a violation of medical ethics.
sentences.chinese: 难民工作者称这种行为违背了医学道德。

detailed_translations.chinese: 伦理学；伦理观；道德标准
detailed_translations.english: Ethics are moral beliefs and rules about right and wrong

sentences.english: The president must have the highest ethical standards.
sentences.chinese: 总统必须具备最高的道德水准。

detailed_translations.chinese: 伦理的；道德的；凭处方出售的
detailed_translations.english: relating to principles of what is right and wrong

name: offending
trans: 令人不愉快的，伤害人的感情的

sentences.english: his offending remarks
sentences.chinese: 他那伤人的话

detailed_translations.chinese: 令人不愉快的，伤害人的感情的
detailed_translations.english: making people feel angry or insulted

sentences.english: Police warned drivers to beware.
sentences.chinese: 警方提醒司机小心行驶。

detailed_translations.english: used to warn someone to be careful because something is dangerous

sentences.english: Consumers will soon be paying higher airfares.
sentences.chinese: 不久消费者就要支付更高的机票价了。

sentences.english: It will offer a wider choice of goods for the consumer (= consumers in general ).
sentences.chinese: 它将为消费者提供更多的商品选择。

sentences.english: Consumer demand led to higher imports of manufactured goods.
sentences.chinese: 消费者需求促使制造商品的进口量增加了。

sentences.english: Consumer spending was down by 0.1% last month.
sentences.chinese: 上个月消费支出下降了0.1%。

sentences.english: sources of consumer advice
sentences.chinese: 给予消费者建议的信息来源

detailed_translations.english: someone who buys and uses products and services

sentences.english: He is a trustworthy and level-headed leader.
sentences.chinese: 他是个可信赖的、头脑冷静的领导。

detailed_translations.english: able to be trusted and depended on
